CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 19 reads: "8. Refreshing Pepsi-Cola kept a steady line of visitors at the Pepsi-Cola Bottling Company of Pittsburgh booth. Edward Jones Jr. receives a Pepsi from the pretty booth attendant, Miss Catherine Curtis"
TitMainTitle: Edward Jones Jr. and Catherine Curtis standing behind a Pepsi-Cola booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
